sqlReaderQuery.value: select data_source_table.PersonID,data_source_table.Name,data_source_table.Age, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from data_source_table RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES data_source_table, @{activity('Lookup_LastVersion').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on data_source_table.PersonID = CT.PersonID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('Lookup_CurrentVersion').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

sources.name: sourceBatting
sources.script:
source(output(
		playerID as string,
		yearID as string,
		stint as string,
		teamID as string,
		lgID as string,
		G as integer,
		AB as integer,
		R as integer,
		H as integer,
		H2B as integer,
		H3B as integer,
		HR as integer,
		RBI as integer,
		SB as integer,
		CS as integer,
		BB as integer,
		SO as integer,
		IBB as integer,
		HBP as integer,
		SH as integer,
		SF as integer,
		GIDP as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sourceBatting

sources.name: sourcePlayer
sources.script:
source(output(
		playerID as string,
		birthYear as string,
		birthMonth as string,
		birthDay as string,
		birthCountry as string,
		birthState as string,
		birthCity as string,
		deathYear as string,
		deathMonth as string,
		deathDay as string,
		deathCountry as string,
		deathState as string,
		deathCity as string,
		nameFirst as string,
		nameLast as string,
		nameGiven as string,
		weight as string,
		height as string,
		bats as string,
		throws as string,
		debut as string,
		finalGame as string,
		retroID as string,
		bbrefID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sourcePlayer

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
AddTimestamp sink(mapColumn(
		playerID_yearID,
		BA,
		OBP,
		SLG,
		TB,
		birthYear,
		birthMonth,
		birthDay,
		birthCountry,
		birthState,
		birthCity,
		deathYear,
		deathMonth,
		deathDay,
		deathCountry,
		deathState,
		deathCity,
		nameFirst,
		nameLast,
		nameGiven,
		weight,
		height,
		bats,
		throws,
		debut,
		finalGame,
		retroID,
		bbrefID,
		playerID = OrigSourceBatting@playerID,
		yearID,
		stint,
		teamID,
		lgID,
		G,
		AB,
		R,
		H,
		H2B,
		H3B,
		HR,
		RBI,
		SB,
		CS,
		BB,
		SO,
		IBB,
		HBP,
		SH,
		SF,
		GIDP,
		currenttime
	),
	saveMode:'overwrite') ~> sink1

transformations.name: createAggs
transformations.script:
sourceBatting aggregate(groupBy(playerID_yearID= playerID+'_'+yearID),
	BA = round(avg(H/AB),3),
		OBP = round(avg((H+BB+HBP)/(AB+BB+HBP+SF)),3),
		SLG = round(avg(((HR * 4) + (H3B * 3) + (H2B * 2) + (H-H2B-H3B-HR))/AB),3),
		TB = max((HR * 4) + (H3B * 3) + (H2B * 2) + (H-H2B-H3B-HR))) ~> createAggs

transformations.name: Join1
transformations.script:
createAggs, PlayerInfoPlusOrigStats join(playerID_yearID == sourcePlayer@playerID + '_'+yearID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1

transformations.name: PlayerInfoPlusOrigStats
transformations.script:
sourcePlayer, OrigSourceBatting join(sourcePlayer@playerID == OrigSourceBatting@playerID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> PlayerInfoPlusOrigStats

transformations.name: OrigSourceBatting
transformations.script: sourceBatting select()~> OrigSourceBatting

transformations.name: AddTimestamp
transformations.script: Join1 derive(currenttime = currentTimestamp()) ~> AddTimestamp

sources.name: sourceBatting
sources.script:
source(output(
		playerID as string,

		SO as integer,

	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sourceBatting

sources.name: sourcePlayer
sources.script:
source(output(
		playerID as string,
		birthYear as string,
		birthMonth as string,
		birthDay as string,
		birthCountry as string,
		birthState as string,
		birthCity as string,
		deathYear as string,
		deathMonth as string,
		deathDay as string,
		deathCountry as string,
		deathState as string,
		deathCity as string,
		nameFirst as string,
		nameLast as string,
		nameGiven as string,
		weight as string,
		height as string,
		bats as string,
		throws as string,
		debut as string,
		finalGame as string,
		retroID as string,
		bbrefID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sourcePlayer

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
Join1 sink(mapColumn(
		BA,
		OBP,
		SLG,
		birthYear,
		birthMonth,
		birthDay,
		birthCountry,
		birthState,
		birthCity,
		deathYear,
		deathMonth,
		deathDay,
		deathCountry,
		deathState,
		deathCity,
		nameFirst,
		nameLast,
		nameGiven,
		weight,
		height,
		bats,
		throws,
		debut,
		finalGame,
		retroID,
		bbrefID,
		playerID = OrigSourceBatting@playerID,
		yearID = OrigSourceBatting@yearID,
		stint,
		teamID,
		lgID,
		G,
		AB,
		R,
		H,
		H2B,
		H3B,
		HR,
		RBI,
		SB,
		CS,
		BB,
		SO,
		IBB,
		HBP,
		SH,
		SF,
		GIDP,
		TB
	),
	saveMode:'overwrite') ~> sink1

transformations.name: createAggs
transformations.script:
CalcTotalBases aggregate(groupBy(playerID,
		yearID),
	BA = round(avg(H/AB),3),
		OBP = round(avg((H+BB+HBP)/(AB+BB+HBP+SF)),3),
		SLG = round(avg(TB/AB),3)) ~> createAggs

transformations.name: Join1
transformations.script:
createAggs, PlayerInfoPlusOrigStats join(createAggs@playerID == sourcePlayer@playerID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1

transformations.name: PlayerInfoPlusOrigStats
transformations.script:
sourcePlayer, OrigSourceBatting join(sourcePlayer@playerID == OrigSourceBatting@playerID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> PlayerInfoPlusOrigStats

transformations.name: CalcTotalBases
transformations.script: sourceBatting derive(TB = (HR * 4) + (H3B * 3) + (H2B * 2) + (H-H2B-H3B-HR)) ~> CalcTotalBases

transformations.name: OrigSourceBatting
transformations.script: CalcTotalBases select()~> OrigSourceBatting

properties.description: Let's now create the advanced Bill James Sabermetrics stats

sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		BA as double,
		OBP as double,
		SLG as double,
		TB as integer,
		birthYear as string,
		birthMonth as string,
		birthDay as string,
		birthCountry as string,
		birthState as string,
		birthCity as string,
		deathYear as string,
		deathMonth as string,
		deathDay as string,
		deathCountry as string,
		deathState as string,
		deathCity as string,
		nameFirst as string,
		nameLast as string,
		nameGiven as string,
		weight as string,
		height as string,
		bats as string,
		throws as string,
		debut as string,
		finalGame as string,
		retroID as string,
		bbrefID as string,
		playerID as string,
		yearID as string,
		stint as string,
		teamID as string,
		lgID as string,
		G as integer,
		AB as integer,
		R as integer,
		H as integer,
		H2B as integer,
		H3B as integer,
		HR as integer,
		RBI as integer,
		SB as integer,
		CS as integer,
		BB as integer,
		SO as integer,
		IBB as integer,
		HBP as integer,
		SH as integer,
		SF as integer,
		GIDP as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
RunsCreated sink(mapColumn(
		BA,
		OBP,
		SLG,
		TB,
		birthYear,
		birthMonth,
		birthDay,
		birthCountry,
		birthState,
		birthCity,
		deathYear,
		deathMonth,
		deathDay,
		deathCountry,
		deathState,
		deathCity,
		nameFirst,
		nameLast,
		nameGiven,
		weight,
		height,
		bats,
		throws,
		debut,
		finalGame,
		retroID,
		bbrefID,
		playerID,
		yearID,
		stint,
		teamID,
		lgID,
		G,
		AB,
		R,
		H,
		H2B,
		H3B,
		HR,
		RBI,
		SB,
		CS,
		BB,
		SO,
		IBB,
		HBP,
		SH,
		SF,
		GIDP,
		RunsCreated
	),
	saveMode:'overwrite') ~> sink1

transformations.name: RunsCreated
transformations.script: source1 derive(RunsCreated = round(  ((H + BB) * TB) / (AB + BB), 3)) ~> RunsCreated

sources.name: SourceSalesHeader
sources.script:
source(output(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		RevisionNumber as string,
		OrderDate as date,
		DueDate as date,
		ShipDate as date,
		Status as string,
		OnlineOrderFlag as boolean,
		SalesOrderNumber as string,
		PurchaseOrderNumber as string,
		AccountNumber as string,
		CustomerID as integer,
		ShipToAddressID as integer,
		BillToAddressID as integer,
		ShipMethod as string,
		CreditCardApprovalCode as string,
		SubTotal as decimal(10,0),
		TaxAmt as decimal(10,0),
		Freight as decimal(10,0),
		TotalDue as decimal(10,0),
		Comment as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SourceSalesHeader

sources.name: SourceSalesDetail
sources.script:
source(output(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		SalesOrderDetailID as integer,
		OrderQty as short,
		ProductID as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(10,0),
		UnitPriceDiscount as decimal(10,0),
		LineTotal as decimal(10,0),
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SourceSalesDetail

sources.name: SourceProduct
sources.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(10,0),
		ListPrice as decimal(10,0),
		Size as string,
		Weight as decimal(10,0),
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ProductModelID as integer,
		SellStartDate as date,
		SellEndDate as date,
		DiscontinuedDate as date,
		ThumbNailPhoto as string,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SourceProduct

sinks.name: SinkFactSales
sinks.script:
Join1 sink(mapColumn(
		OrderTotal,
		RevisionNumber,
		OrderDate,
		DueDate,
		ShipDate,
		Status,
		OnlineOrderFlag,
		SalesOrderNumber,
		PurchaseOrderNumber,
		AccountNumber,
		CustomerID,
		ShipToAddressID,
		BillToAddressID,
		ShipMethod,
		CreditCardApprovalCode,
		SubTotal,
		TaxAmt,
		Freight,
		TotalDue,
		Comment,
		rowguid,
		ModifiedDate
	),
	saveMode:'overwrite') ~> SinkFactSales

sinks.name: sinkDimProd
sinks.script:
Aggregate2 sink(mapColumn(
		Name,
		ProdCount
	),
	saveMode:'overwrite') ~> sinkDimProd

transformations.name: Aggregate1
transformations.script:
SourceSalesDetail aggregate(groupBy(SalesOrderID),
	OrderTotal = sum(LineTotal)) ~> Aggregate1

transformations.name: Join1
transformations.script:
Aggregate1, SourceSalesHeader join(Aggregate1@SalesOrderID == SourceSalesHeader@SalesOrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1

transformations.name: Join2
transformations.script:
SourceSalesDetail, SourceProduct join(SourceSalesDetail@ProductID == SourceProduct@ProductID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join2

transformations.name: Aggregate2
transformations.script:
Join2 aggregate(groupBy(Name),
	ProdCount = sum(1)) ~> Aggregate2

sources.script:
source(output(
		SalesOrderID as integer,

sources.name: SourceProduct
sources.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as integer,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(10,0),
		ListPrice as decimal(10,0),

sources.name: ProdCategoryLookup
sources.script:
source(output(
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		ParentProductCategoryID as integer,
		Name as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ProdCategoryLookup

sinks.name: SinkFactSales
sinks.script:
Join1 sink(mapColumn(
		SalesOrderID = Aggregate1@SalesOrderID,
		OrderTotal,
		RevisionNumber,
		OrderDate,
		DueDate,
		ShipDate,
		Status,
		OnlineOrderFlag,
		SalesOrderNumber,
		PurchaseOrderNumber,
		AccountNumber,
		CustomerID,
		ShipToAddressID,
		BillToAddressID,
		ShipMethod,
		CreditCardApprovalCode,
		SubTotal,
		TaxAmt,
		Freight,
		TotalDue,
		Comment,
		rowguid,
		ModifiedDate
	),
	saveMode:'overwrite') ~> SinkFactSales

sinks.name: sinkDimProd
sinks.script:
Aggregate2 sink(mapColumn(
		ProdName = Color,
		ProdCount
	),
	saveMode:'overwrite') ~> sinkDimProd

transformations.name: Aggregate1
transformations.script:
SourceSalesDetail aggregate(groupBy(SalesOrderID),
	OrderTotal = sum(LineTotal)) ~> Aggregate1

transformations.name: Join1
transformations.script:
Aggregate1, SourceSalesHeader join(Aggregate1@SalesOrderID == SourceSalesHeader@SalesOrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1

transformations.name: Join2
transformations.script:
SourceSalesDetail, Select1 join(SourceSalesDetail@ProductID == Select1@ProductID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join2

transformations.name: Aggregate2
transformations.script:
Join2 aggregate(groupBy(Color),
	ProdCount = sum(1)) ~> Aggregate2

transformations.name: Lookup1
transformations.script:
ProdCategoryLookup, SourceProduct lookup(ProdCategoryLookup@ProductCategoryID == SourceProduct@ProductCategoryID,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Lookup1

transformations.name: Select1
transformations.script:
Lookup1 select(mapColumn(
		ProdCategoryLookup@ProductCategoryID,
		ParentProductCategoryID,
		ProdCategoryLookup@Name,
		ProductID,
		SourceProduct@Name,
		ProductNumber,
		Color,
		StandardCost,
		ListPrice,
		Size,
		Weight,
		ProductModelID,
		SellStartDate,
		SellEndDate,
		DiscontinuedDate
	))~> Select1

properties.description: Sample demo data flow to convert currencies

sources.name: USDCurrency
sources.script:
source(output(
		PreviousConversionRate as double,
		Country as string,
		DateTime1 as string,
		CurrentConversionRate as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> USDCurrency

sources.name: CADSource
sources.script:
source(output(
		PreviousConversionRate as double,
		Country as string,
		DateTime1 as string,
		CurrentConversionRate as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CADSource

transformations.name: Union
transformations.script: USDCurrency, CADSource union(byName: true)~> Union

transformations.name: NewCurrencyColumn
transformations.description: Create a new calculated column from currency rate
transformations.script: Union derive(NewCurrencyRate = round(CurrentConversionRate*1.25)) ~> NewCurrencyColumn

transformations.name: ConditionalSplit1
transformations.description: Split the data on state to create 2 streams
transformations.script:
NewCurrencyColumn split(Country == 'USD',
	Country == 'CAD',
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(USD, CAD)

sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		Name as string,
		ProdCount as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
source1 sink(mapColumn(
		digit = Name
	),
	saveMode:'append') ~> sink1

sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		ProdName as string,
		ProdCount as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
source1 sink(mapColumn(
		ProdName,
		ProdCount
	),
	saveMode:'append') ~> sink1

sources.name: SalesSource1
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SalesSource1

transformations.name: AddTax
transformations.script: SalesSource1 derive(each(match(name == 'COGS' || name == 'Cost'), $$+'_with_tax' = round(toDouble(trim($$,'$')) * 1.09,2))) ~> AddTax

transformations.name: CleanTotal
transformations.script: AddTax derive(each(match(locate('with_tax',name) > 0), $$ = left('$'+toString($$)+'00',locate('.', $$)+3))) ~> CleanTotal

sources.name: Movies
sources.script:
source(output(
		movieId as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		dummy as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Movies

transformations.name: MoviesYear
transformations.script:
SplitGenres derive(year = toInteger(trim(right(title, 6), '()')),
		title = toString(left(title, length(title)-6))) ~> MoviesYear

transformations.name: MoviesAfter1980
transformations.script: MoviesYear filter(year > 1980) ~> MoviesAfter1980

transformations.name: SplitGenres
transformations.script: Movies derive(splitgenres = toString(split(genres,'|'))) ~> SplitGenres

sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		{Rotton Tomato} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1

transformations.name: MoviesBefore1990
transformations.script: source1 filter(year < 1990) ~> MoviesBefore1990

transformations.name: Aggregate1
transformations.script:
MoviesBefore1990 aggregate(groupBy(genres),
	Rating = avg(Rating)) ~> Aggregate1

sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1

transformations.name: SurrogateKey1
transformations.script:
source1 keyGenerate(output(undefined as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1

sources.name: SQLProducts

		ProductID as integer,

		StandardCost as decimal(10,0),

sources.name: DimProd
sources.script:
source(output(
		ProductKey as integer,
		ProductAlternateKey as string,
		ProductSubcategoryKey as integer,
		WeightUnitMeasureCode as string,
		SizeUnitMeasureCode as string,
		EnglishProductName as string,
		SpanishProductName as string,
		FrenchProductName as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(10,0),
		FinishedGoodsFlag as boolean,
		Color as string,
		SafetyStockLevel as short,
		ReorderPoint as short,
		ListPrice as decimal(10,0),
		Size as string,
		SizeRange as string,
		Weight as double,
		DaysToManufacture as integer,
		ProductLine as string,
		DealerPrice as decimal(10,0),
		Class as string,
		Style as string,
		ModelName as string,
		EnglishDescription as string,
		FrenchDescription as string,
		ChineseDescription as string,
		ArabicDescription as string,
		HebrewDescription as string,
		ThaiDescription as string,
		GermanDescription as string,
		JapaneseDescription as string,
		TurkishDescription as string,
		StartDate as timestamp,
		EndDate as timestamp,
		Status as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> DimProd

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
SetAttributes sink(mapColumn(
		ProductKey = ProductID,
		ProductAlternateKey = surrogatekey,
		ProductSubcategoryKey,
		WeightUnitMeasureCode,
		SizeUnitMeasureCode,
		EnglishProductName = Name,
		SpanishProductName,
		FrenchProductName,
		StandardCost,
		FinishedGoodsFlag = mybit,
		Color,
		SafetyStockLevel,
		ReorderPoint,
		ListPrice,
		Size,
		SizeRange,
		Weight,
		DaysToManufacture,
		ProductLine,
		DealerPrice,
		Class,
		Style,
		ModelName,
		EnglishDescription,
		FrenchDescription,
		ChineseDescription,
		ArabicDescription,
		HebrewDescription,
		ThaiDescription,
		GermanDescription,
		JapaneseDescription,
		TurkishDescription,
		StartDate,
		EndDate,
		Status
	),
	saveMode:'append') ~> sink1

transformations.name: LookupKeys
transformations.script:
SQLProducts, DimProd join(ProductID == ProductKey,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupKeys

transformations.name: ConditionalSplit1
transformations.script:
ColumnSelection split(isNull(ProductAlternateKey),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(NewRow, ExistingMember)

transformations.name: SurrogateKey1
transformations.script:
ConditionalSplit1@NewRow keyGenerate(output(surrogatekey as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1

transformations.name: ColumnSelection
transformations.script:
LookupKeys select(mapColumn(
		ProductID,
		Name,
		ProductNumber,
		Color = SQLProducts@Color,
		StandardCost = SQLProducts@StandardCost,
		ListPrice = SQLProducts@ListPrice,
		Size = SQLProducts@Size,
		Weight = SQLProducts@Weight,
		ProductKey,
		ProductAlternateKey,
		ProductSubcategoryKey,
		WeightUnitMeasureCode,
		SizeUnitMeasureCode,
		EnglishProductName,
		SpanishProductName,
		FrenchProductName,
		FinishedGoodsFlag,
		SafetyStockLevel,
		ReorderPoint,
		SizeRange,
		DaysToManufacture,
		ProductLine,
		DealerPrice,
		Class,
		Style,
		ModelName,
		EnglishDescription,
		FrenchDescription,
		ChineseDescription,
		ArabicDescription,
		HebrewDescription,
		ThaiDescription,
		GermanDescription,
		JapaneseDescription,
		TurkishDescription,
		StartDate,
		EndDate,
		Status
	))~> ColumnSelection

transformations.name: SetAttributes
transformations.script:
SurrogateKey1 derive(surrogatekey = concat('abcd', toString(1)),
		Status = 'Y',
		StartDate = currentDate(),
		EndDate = 1200,
		NullDesc = toString('  '),
		mybit = 0) ~> SetAttributes

sources.name: SalesSource1
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SalesSource1

transformations.name: AddTax
transformations.script: SalesSource1 derive(each(match(regexMatch(name, 'COGS')), $$+'_with_tax' = round(toDouble(trim($$,'$')) * 1.09,2))) ~> AddTax

transformations.name: CleanTotal
transformations.script: AddTax derive(each(match(locate('with_tax',name) > 0), $$ = left('$'+toString($$)+'00',locate('.', $$)+3))) ~> CleanTotal

sources.name: TripData
sources.script:
source(output(
		medallion as string,
		hack_license as string,
		vendor_id as string,
		rate_code as string,
		store_and_fwd_flag as string,
		pickup_datetime as string,
		dropoff_datetime as string,
		passenger_count as short,
		trip_time_in_secs as long,
		trip_distance as double,
		pickup_longitude as double,
		pickup_latitude as double,
		dropoff_longitude as double,
		dropoff_latitude as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> TripData

sources.name: TripFare
sources.script:
source(output(
		medallion as string,
		{ hack_license} as string,
		{ vendor_id} as string,
		{ pickup_datetime} as string,
		{ payment_type} as string,
		{ fare_amount} as double,
		{ surcharge} as double,
		{ mta_tax} as double,
		{ tip_amount} as double,
		{ tolls_amount} as double,
		{ total_amount} as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> TripFare

transformations.name: JoinMatchedData
AggregateVendorStats
transformations.script:
JoinMatchedData aggregate(groupBy(vendor_id),
	passenger_count = round(sum(passenger_count), 2),
		trip_time_in_secs = round(sum(trip_time_in_secs)/60, 2),
		trip_distance = round(sum(trip_distance), 2),
		TotalTripFare = round(sum({ total_amount}), 2)) ~> AggregateVendorStats

transformations.name: AggregateDayStats
transformations.script:
JoinMatchedData aggregate(groupBy(DayOfTheWeek= dayOfWeek(toDate(pickup_datetime,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss'))),
	trip_distance = round(avg(trip_distance), 2),
		passenger_count = round(avg(passenger_count), 2),
		trip_time_in_secs = round(avg(trip_time_in_secs)/60, 2),
		average_fare = round(avg({ total_amount}), 2)) ~> AggregateDayStats

transformations.name: AggregateByPaymentType
transformations.script:
TripFare aggregate(groupBy({ payment_type}= { payment_type}),
	each(match(type=='double'), concat($$, '_total') = round(sum ($$)))) ~> AggregateByPaymentType

sources.name: TripData
sources.script:
source(output(
		medallion as string,
		hack_license as string,
		vendor_id as string,
		rate_code as string,
		store_and_fwd_flag as string,
		pickup_datetime as string,
		dropoff_datetime as string,
		passenger_count as integer,
		trip_time_in_secs as long,
		trip_distance as double,
		pickup_longitude as double,
		pickup_latitude as double,
		dropoff_longitude as double,
		dropoff_latitude as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> TripData

sources.name: TripFare
sources.script:
source(output(
		medallion as string,
		hack_license as string,
		vendor_id as string,
		pickup_datetime as string,
		payment_type as string,
		fare_amount as double,
		surcharge as double,
		mta_tax as double,
		tip_amount as double,
		tolls_amount as double,
		total_amount as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> TripFare

transformations.name: JoinMatchedData
transformations.script:
TripData, TripFare join(TripData@hack_license == TripFare@hack_license
	&& TripData@medallion == TripFare@medallion
	&& TripData@vendor_id == TripFare@vendor_id
	&& TripData@pickup_datetime == TripFare@pickup_datetime,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinMatchedData

transformations.name: AggregateVendorStats
transformations.script:
JoinMatchedData aggregate(groupBy(vendor_id2= TripData@vendor_id),
	passenger_count = round(sum(passenger_count), 2),
		trip_time_in_secs = round(sum(trip_time_in_secs)/60, 2),
		trip_distance = round(sum(trip_distance), 2),
		TotalTripFare = round(sum(total_amount), 2)) ~> AggregateVendorStats

transformations.name: AggregateDayStats
transformations.script:
JoinMatchedData aggregate(groupBy(DayOfTheWeek= dayOfWeek(toDate(TripData@pickup_datetime,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss'))),
	trip_distance = round(avg(trip_distance), 2),
		passenger_count = round(avg(passenger_count), 2),
		trip_time_in_secs = round(avg(trip_time_in_secs)/60, 2),
		average_fare = round(avg(total_amount), 2)) ~> AggregateDayStats

transformations.name: AggregateByPaymentType
transformations.script:
TripFare aggregate(groupBy(payment_type),
	each(match(type=='double'), concat($$, '_total') = round(sum ($$)))) ~> AggregateByPaymentType

sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as string,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(10,0),
		ListPrice as decimal(10,0),
		Size as string,
		Weight as string,
		ProductCategoryID as string,
		ProductModelID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1

transformations.name: Window1
transformations.script:
source1 window(over(Color),
	desc(StandardCost, true),
	rownum = rowNumber()) ~> Window1

sources.name: AddressSource
sources.script:
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		Address1 as string,
		Address2 as string,
		City as string,
		Prop_4 as string,
		Prop_5 as string,
		Prop_6 as string,
		Prop_7 as string,
		Prop_8 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> AddressSource

transformations.name: CleanAddress
transformations.script: AddressSource derive(each(match(type == 'string'), $$ + '_clean' = trim(trim($$, '.'), '  '))) ~> CleanAddress

sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		id as string,
		city as string,
		loc as string,
		pop as long,
		state as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1

sources.name: prodSource
sources.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as string,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(10,0),
		ListPrice as string,
		Size as string,
		Weight as string,
		ProductCategoryID as string,
		ProductModelID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> prodSource

sources.name: paramsFile
sources.script:
source(output(
		ParamColor as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> paramsFile

transformations.name: getParams
transformations.script:
prodSource, paramsFile lookup(Color == ParamColor,
	broadcast: 'none')~> getParams

transformations.name: FilterRows
transformations.script: getParams filter(Color == ParamColor) ~> FilterRows

transformations.name: AggregateStandardCost
transformations.script:
FilterRows aggregate(groupBy(Color),
	AverageStandardCostByColor = '$'+toString(round(avg(StandardCost),2))) ~> AggregateStandardCost

sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		playerID as string,
		yearID as string,
		stint as string,
		teamID as string,
		lgID as string,
		G as string,
		AB as string,
		R as string,
		H as string,
		H2B as string,
		H3B as string,
		HR as string,
		RBI as string,
		SB as string,
		CS as string,
		BB as string,
		SO as string,
		IBB as string,
		HBP as string,
		SH as string,
		SF as string,
		GIDP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1

transformations.name: Aggregate1
transformations.script:
source1 aggregate(groupBy(playerID_year= playerID+yearID),
	dummy = sum(1)) ~> Aggregate1

sources.name: sourceFlights
sources.script:
source(output(
		YEAR as short,
		MONTH as short,
		FL_DATE as timestamp,
		UNIQUE_CARRIER as string,
		AIRLINE_ID as integer,
		CARRIER as string,
		TAIL_NUM as string,
		FL_NUM as integer,
		ORIGIN_AIRPORT_ID as integer,
		ORIGIN_AIRPORT_SEQ_ID as integer,
		ORIGIN_CITY_MARKET_ID as integer,
		DEST_AIRPORT_ID as integer,
		DEST_AIRPORT_SEQ_ID as integer,
		DEST_CITY_MARKET_ID as integer,
		DEP_TIME as string,
		DEP_DELAY as double,
		DEP_DELAY_NEW as double,
		TAXI_OUT as double,
		WHEELS_OFF as string,
		WHEELS_ON as string,
		TAXI_IN as double,
		ARR_TIME as string,
		ARR_DELAY as double,
		ARR_DELAY_NEW as double,
		CANCELLED as boolean,
		CANCELLATION_CODE as string,
		ACTUAL_ELAPSED_TIME as double,
		AIR_TIME as double,
		FLIGHTS as integer,
		DISTANCE as integer,
		CARRIER_DELAY as double,
		WEATHER_DELAY as double,
		NAS_DELAY as double,
		SECURITY_DELAY as double,
		LATE_AIRCRAFT_DELAY as double,
		DEST_CODE as string,
		ORIGIN_CODE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sourceFlights

sources.name: sourceAirlines
sources.script:
source(output(
		Code as integer,
		Airline_Code as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sourceAirlines

sources.name: sourceAirports
sources.script:
source(output(
		Code as string,
		City_Airport as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sourceAirports

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
Aggregate1 sink(mapColumn(
		carrier = CARRIER,
		year = YEAR,
		delays = totalDelays
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	saveMode:'overwrite') ~> sink1

transformations.name: Lookup1
transformations.script:
sourceFlights, sourceAirlines lookup(AIRLINE_ID == toInteger(Code),
	broadcast: 'none')~> Lookup1

transformations.name: Lookup2
transformations.script:
Lookup1, sourceAirports lookup(ORIGIN_AIRPORT_ID == toInteger(sourceAirports@Code),
	broadcast: 'none')~> Lookup2

transformations.name: Aggregate1
transformations.script:
Lookup2 aggregate(groupBy(CARRIER,
		YEAR),
	totalDelays = sum(CARRIER_DELAY),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Aggregate1

sources.name: ProductSource
sources.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as string,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(10,0),
		ListPrice as string,
		Size as string,
		Weight as string,
		ProductCategoryID as string,
		ProductModelID as string,
		SellStartDate as string,
		SellEndDate as string,
		DiscontinuedDate as string,
		ThumbNailPhoto as string,
		ThumbnailPhotoFileName as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ProductSource

sources.name: ProductSource
sources.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as string,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(10,0),
		ListPrice as string,
		Size as string,
		Weight as string,
		ProductCategoryID as string,
		ProductModelID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ProductSource

transformations.name: PivotColorStandardCost
transformations.script:
ProductSource pivot(groupBy(Name,
		ProductID),
	pivotBy(Color),
	CostSum = sum(StandardCost),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true) ~> PivotColorStandardCost

transformations.name: ProductSourceBranch
transformations.script:
ProductSource select(mapColumn(
		ProductID2 = ProductID,
		Name,
		ProductNumber,
		Color,
		StandardCost,
		ListPrice,
		Size,
		Weight,
		ProductCategoryID,
		ProductModelID
	))~> ProductSourceBranch

transformations.name: Join1
transformations.script:
PivotColorStandardCost, ProductSourceBranch join(ProductID == ProductID2,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1

sources.name: IncomingAddresses
sources.script:
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		Address1 as string,
		Address2 as string,
		City as string,
		Prop_4 as string,
		Prop_5 as string,
		Prop_6 as string,
		Prop_7 as string,
		Prop_8 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> IncomingAddresses

transformations.name: CleanAddress
transformations.script:
IncomingAddresses derive(clean_address = regexReplace(Address1,`[ ]{2}|\.`,' '),
		house_num = regex_extract(Address1, `^(\d+)`, 1)) ~> CleanAddress

transformations.name: ConditionalSplit1
transformations.script:
CleanAddress split(rlike(City,'^[A-G]'),
	rlike(City,'^[H-P]'),
	rlike(City,'^[Q-Z]'),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(AThruG, HThruP, QThruZ, other)

sources.name: SpecifySchemaExtract
sources.script:
source(output(
		id_odsp as string,
		id_event as string,
		sort_order as integer,
		time as integer,
		text as string,
		event_type as string,
		event_type2 as string,
		side as string,
		event_team as string,
		opponent as string,
		player as string,
		player2 as string,
		player_in as string,
		player_out as string,
		shot_place as string,
		shot_outcome as string,
		is_goal as string,
		location as string,
		bodypart as string,
		assist_method as string,
		situation as string,
		fast_break as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SpecifySchemaExtract

sources.name: locationMap
sources.script:
source(output(
		Type as string,
		Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> locationMap

transformations.name: DictionaryMapping1
transformations.script:
SpecifySchemaExtract derive(eventTypeMap = case(
    event_type == '0','Announcement',
    event_type == '1','Attempt',
    event_type == '2','Corner',
    event_type == '3','Foul',
    event_type == '4','Yellow Card',
    event_type == '5','Second yellow card',
    event_type == '6','Red card',
    event_type == '7','Substitution',
    event_type == '8','Free kick won',
    event_type == '9','Offside',
    event_type == '10','Hand ball',
    event_type == '11','Penalty conceded',
    event_type == '99', 'NA'
),
		time = toInteger(time)) ~> DictionaryMapping1

transformations.name: JoinStringDataViaLookup
transformations.script:
DictionaryMapping1, locationMap lookup(location == Type,
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinStringDataViaLookup

transformations.name: TimeBins
transformations.script:
ColumnSelectionNaming window(over(time),
	asc(event_type2, true),
	TimeBins = rowNumber()) ~> TimeBins

transformations.name: ColumnSelectionNaming
transformations.script:
JoinStringDataViaLookup select(mapColumn(
		id_odsp,
		id_event,
		sort_order,
		time,
		text,
		event_type2,
		side,
		event_team,
		opponent,
		player,
		player2,
		player_in,
		player_out,
		shot_place,
		shot_outcome,
		is_goal,
		location,
		bodypart,
		assist_method,
		situation,
		fast_break,
		eventTypeName = eventTypeMap,
		LocationName = Name
	))~> ColumnSelectionNaming
